changes.description: Enhanced roadmap grid view with dynamic column sizing - work items column now expands from 450px to accommodate longer titles without truncation
Enabled horizontal scrolling for month/quarter columns - allows viewing 12+ months while maintaining readability with consistent 200px column widths
Work item titles now wrap intelligently within cards and labels instead of being truncated with ellipsis
Month/quarter date headers now display on a single line without wrapping (e.g., 'Jan 2026', 'Feb 2027') to eliminate confusion when spanning multiple years
Added sticky work items column that remains visible while scrolling horizontally through timeline
Enhanced scrollbar visibility with purple theme color and larger 12px size for easier navigation
Improved responsive behavior across all screen sizes while maintaining consistent month column widths
Added hierarchical backlog view for unscheduled items, similar to Azure DevOps - work items now display in parent-child relationships with expand/collapse controls
Epic-focused navigation - when 'All Types' is selected, only Epics are shown at root level, allowing users to drill down into Features, PBIs, and Bugs
Multiple state selection - users can now select multiple states simultaneously using checkboxes instead of a single dropdown
Redesigned work item cards with cleaner, more professional appearance - neutral backgrounds with subtle colored left borders based on work item type
Unscheduled sidebar now collapses by default to provide more space for the calendar view, and can be expanded up to 1000px wide (increased from 600px)
Enhanced visual hierarchy with proper indentation (20px per level) for child work items
Work item type color coding: Epic (Purple), Feature (Blue), Bug (Red), PBI (Green), TBI (Amber)
Added tag editing functionality in work item details panel - users can now add and remove tags directly from the details view
Added related items section for Feature work items, displaying child PBIs, Technical Backlog Items, and bugs with full navigation support
Enhanced tag display with remove buttons and inline add input for quick tag management
Extended related items functionality to Features, matching the existing capability for PBIs and TBIs
Renamed 'Analytics' view to 'Planning' for clearer purpose alignment
Standardized all tab headers to be left-aligned with consistent 24px font size and 600 font-weight
Unified tab names: 'Cycle Time', 'Developer Stats', 'QA Metrics', 'Roadmap', 'Releases'
Removed center-alignment and max-width constraints from Developer Stats view for full-width consistency
Applied consistent 24px padding across all planning tab views
Added delete functionality for release epics with confirmation modal
Fixed React DOM nesting warning with whitespace in tbody elements
Added missing handleDeleteReleaseEpic function to ReleaseView component
Implemented DELETE /api/releases/:epicId endpoint for removing release epics

title: Enhanced Work Item Details & Rich Content Display

changes.description: Added comprehensive work item details panel showing type-specific fields (Description, Acceptance Criteria, Repro Steps, Design, Discussions)
Implemented rich text field component with collapsible sections for HTML content from Azure DevOps
Added dynamic discussions/comments fetching from Azure DevOps comments API
Expanded Related Items to show parent, child, and related work items (not just children)
Added navigation history with Back button for browsing through related work items
Added Tags section displaying work item tags as styled badges
Increased default Details Panel width to 45% of screen for better content viewing
Updated Details Panel max width to 70% of screen (from fixed 800px)
Redesigned Back button with modern outline style and smooth hover animations
Work item fields now always render even when empty, showing 'No content provided'
Add indicator to profile icon
Added collapsible Unscheduled Items section in agenda view for better space management
Added resizable Details Panel - drag the left edge to adjust width (300-800px)
Added resizable Unscheduled Items list - drag the right edge to adjust width (200-600px)
Work item tags are now properly fetched and displayed
Improved panel resize experience with visual feedback on hover
Added due date change history tracking with reason logging
Added related items view for PBIs and TBIs
Support for QA Complete Date and Target Date fields
Epic progress visualization with child items tracking
Advanced filtering by iteration, work item type, assignee, and state
Search functionality for unscheduled items
Collapsible unscheduled items sidebar
Improved calendar performance with optimized rendering
Calendar view for visualizing work items by due date
Azure DevOps integration for PBIs, TBIs, Epics, Features, and Bugs
Drag and drop to schedule/unschedule items
Work item details panel with inline editing
Cycle time analytics and developer statistics
